name: Catch the Rats!!
description:
This game was a project done for Godot Wild Jam #24, with the theme "Family".

As a family, catch as many rats as you can in a single minute!

Controls:

Movement: Keyboard Arrow Keys

Swap Controlled Character: Keyboard Buttons 1/2

Credits:

@HollowHawk: Game Designer and Programmer

@Byronico: Sound Composer and Engineer

@Alex: Digital Artist

@Pam: Playtester

@VaJa72: Programmer

Text font downloaded externally: https://www.dafont.com/wash-your-hand.font
